account.ui:help: The full name of your account (provided by Snowflake). The account name does not contain .snowflakecomputing.com. It's using the format of <account_name>[.<region_id>][.<cloud>]. For example: (e.g. 'xy12345.east-us-2.azure') Further information at https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/connecting.html#your-snowflake-account-name

database.ui:help: The default database to use for the session after connecting.

warehouse.ui:help: The default virtual warehouse to use for the session after connecting. Used for performing queries, loading data, etc.

schema.ui:help: The default schema to use for the session after connecting.

role.ui:help: The default security role to use for the session after connecting.
